sentences.english: The preserved Sugar Railway Chi-Shan Station.
sentences.chinese: 被保存下來的糖鐵旗山車站。

sentences.english: The mineralization type of Shaungqishan gold deposit has been divided into quartz vein and alteration type.
sentences.chinese: 將雙旗山金礦礦化類型劃分爲石英脈型和蝕變巖型。

sentences.english: Elder Lee used to be a counselor in the Chishan branch.
sentences.chinese: 李長老以前是旗山分會的副會長。
